name: Cook or Burn
description:
Your goal is to make and serve dishes in the given time. 

Navigate with the arrows in the kitchen: Cutting board in the left, orders and plates in the middle, pans for frying in the right.

Interact with the cutting board by clicking on it to select tomatoes and lemon, and click them multiple times for slicing them. Collect the slices when the green checkmark appears by click on it.

Click the pans to start fry meat, fish and potatoes. Once it done, collect them when the green checkmark appears by click on it. Be careful, it can burn!

To serve the plates, click the top bar items to highlight components for the plates and click one of the plate to place the component on it. Green checkmark apepras when the plate is done - click on it to serve!

Feel free to post your score! Enjoy! :)

Please note, this game still in development, gameplay and graphics may, and will change over time. 

Known issues: UI elements can be misplaced or maybe partially off-screen, especially in mobile.
